title: R - ready (but it's not)
body:
In game, it always says my R is "ready" when I ping it. This happens before I hit level 6, when it's out of mana, and when it's on cd. It just always says "ready."

I've gotten used to pinging it to let people know when it's not ready, so this has caused some miscommunication in game.

replies.body:
It sounds like this might be an issue with your configuration files. For some reason, the game file that should tell you that your ultimate isn't ready might be corrupted. Let's see if refreshing your configurations to default fixes that!

- Log into the game client.
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  
- Leave game to sync settings.

Let me know if that helps!
